pathway.author: [LarsEijssen, Andra, MirellaKalafati, MaintBot]

comments.content: Pyridoxal 5'-phosphate (PLP) is the biochemically active form of pyridoxine 5'-phosphate (PNP)or vitamin B6. PLP is an essential cofactor of numerous metabolic enzymes, predominantly in amino acid metabolism

Synonyms: vitamin B6 biosynthesis and salvage  /  This superpathway shows the various ways that E. coli can obtain pyridoxal 5'-phosphate, a coenzyme for many enzymes that participate in amino acid and glycogen metabolism.
This pathway has been manually created based on Lycocyc content: Lyco: PWY0-845
